text.div:
C2S HIV/AIDS Information Sensitivity

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcs
    Code Display
    0575F Hiv rna control plan of care, documented (hiv)
    3292F Hiv testing ordered or documented and reviewed during the first or second prenatal visit (pre-cr)
    3490F History of aids-defining condition (hiv)
    3491F Hiv indeterminate (infants of undetermined hiv status born of hiv-infected mothers) (hiv)
    3492F History of nadir cd4+ cell count <350 cells/mm (hiv)
    3493F No history of nadir cd4+ cell count <350 cells/mmand no history of aids-defining condition (hiv)
    3494F Cd4+ cell count <200 cells/mm (hiv)
    3495F Cd4+ cell count 200 - 499 cells/mm (hiv)
    3496F Cd4+ cell count =500 cells/mm (hiv)
    3497F Cd4+ cell percentage <15% (hiv)
    3498F Cd4+ cell percentage >/=15% (hiv)
    3500F Cd4+ cell count or cd4+ cell percentage documented as performed (hiv)
    3502F Hiv rna viral load below limits of quantification (hiv)
    3503F Hiv rna viral load not below limits of quantification (hiv)
    3510F Documentation that tuberculosis (tb) screening test performed and results interpreted (hiv) (ibd)
    3511F Chlamydia and gonorrhea screenings documented as performed (hiv)
    3512F Syphilis screening documented as performed (hiv)
    3513F Hepatitis b screening documented as performed (hiv)
    3514F Hepatitis c screening documented as performed (hiv)
    3515F Patient has documented immunity to hepatitis c (hiv)
    4149F Hepatitis b vaccine injection administered or previously received (hep-c, hiv) (ibd)
    4270F Patient receiving potent antiretroviral therapy for 6 months or longer (hiv)
    4271F Patient receiving potent antiretroviral therapy for less than 6 months or not receiving potent antiretroviral therapy (hiv)
    4274F Influenza immunization administered or previously received (hiv) (p-esrd)
    4276F Potent antiretroviral therapy prescribed (hiv)
    4279F Pneumocystis jiroveci pneumonia prophylaxis prescribed (hiv)
    4280F Pneumocystis jiroveci pneumonia prophylaxis prescribed within 3 months of low cd4+ cell count or percentage (hiv)
    4290F Patient screened for injection drug use (hiv)
    4293F Patient screened for high-risk sexual behavior (hiv)
    86689 Confirmation test for antibody to Human T-cell lymphotropic virus (HTLV) or HIV
    86701 Analysis for antibody to HIV -1 virus
    86702 Analysis for antibody to HIV-2 virus
    86703 Analysis for antibody to HIV-1 and HIV-2 virus
    87389 Detection test for HIV-1 and HIV-2
    87390 Detection test for HIV-1
    87391 Detection test for HIV-2
    87534 Detection test for HIV-1 virus
    87535 Detection test for HIV-1 virus
    87536 Detection test for HIV-1 virus
    87537 Detection test for HIV-2 virus
    87538 Detection test for HIV-2 virus
    87539 Detection test for HIV-2 virus
    87900 Infectious agent drug susceptibility analysis
    87901 Analysis test for HIV-1 virus
    87903 Analysis test for HIV-1 virus
    87904 Analysis test for HIV-1 virus
    87906 Analysis test for HIV-1 virus
    G0432 Infectious agent antibody detection by enzyme immunoassay (eia) technique, hiv-1 and/or hiv-2, screening
    G0433 Infectious agent antibody detection by enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (elisa) technique, hiv-1 and/or hiv-2, screening
    G0435 Infectious agent antibody detection by rapid antibody test, hiv-1 and/or hiv-2, screening
    G8491 I intend to report the hiv/aids measures group
    G8500 All quality actions for the applicable measures in the hiv/aids measures group have been performed for this patient
    S3645 Hiv-1 antibody testing of oral mucosal transudate
